atham sthanawala digu polim daknata labunu athara, salakiya yuthu pirisak sancharana simawanta yatathwa katayuthu kala bawata da pradesha rasakin wartha wuna.me athara, waidyawarun lesa peni sitimin saha waidya lanchanaya awabhawitha karamin katayuthu kala thideneku da polisiya ada kolambaadi athadanguwata gena thibuna.me athara, sancharana sima panawa thibiyadi nirodhayana nithi ullanghanaya kara nithiwirodhi mathpan jawarame niratha wu pudgalayin 3 deneku da beruwala di athadanguwata gena thibenawa.paliyagoda mathsya welanda sankirnaya da ada wiwrutha kara thibu athara, mathsya mila ganan ihala mattamaka pawathi bawa wartha wanawa.diwayina pura kriyathmaka sancharana sima ada aluyama 4 ta lihil kerunu athara eya ada rathri 11ta yali balathmaka wanawa.ee anuwa, juni 7 wanada dakwa eya balapawathwena athara, mayi 31 saha juni 4 yana dinayanhi yali athyawashya bhanda miladi ganima sandaha sancharana sima lihil kirimata niyamithayi.

wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha athulu eksath jathika pakshayata kisidina jayagrahanaya kala nohaki nisa ratata sewaya karannata janadhipathithuma samanga athwal bandagath bawa rambaawa pradeshiya sabhawe wipaksha nayaka si. en. saliya mahatha (e.ja.pa) pawasiya.siyalu wada beda athahara rata godanangannata ekwana lesa wipaksha nayakawaraya athulu siyalu ejapa samajikayan gen illa sitina bawath saliya mahatha prakasha kale ya.si. en. saliya mahatha me adahas pala kale palath sabha mathiwaranaye di eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye wijayagrahanaya thahawuru kerena dawantha jana raliye di janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha hamuwimen pasu adahas dakwamini.dekada wunu janatha wimukthi peramune depala beda gannata kerena aarawul desa bala sitiya di hatagath kalakirima nisa sandhanaya samanga athwal banda gath bawa janatha wimukthi peramune mihinthalaya aasana sanwidhayaka, disthrik bhandagarika, hitapu palath sabha manthri rohana pushpakumara mahatha kiweya.thawath wasara 50 k giyath janatha wimukthi peramuna wardhanaya nowana bawath pakshaye bedim janathawa thula wardhanaya karanne kalakirima pamanak bawath hethema kiweya.jayasiri munasinha, dhanushka godakumbaura, chula bandara kulasekara, thennakon kulasekara, kithsiri wanasinha, amila prabhath wanasinha anuradhapuraya sita.
